channel.title: See Through
channel.description:
Ok well I recently added Ganodermic to my PI server and it works fine up until the point that when I wear the visor and poncho you can see through them so I looked up how to fix that and I fixed the poncho but when I try to fix the visor you can still see through the visor, can someone help me with this please? To fix the poncho I went in to 1.Item.Java 2public static boolean playerBody(int itemId) { 3. , "Poncho", 4.private static String[] fullbody = { 5. , "Poncho" 6.Compile, log in and boom it was fixed!!!
But now when I do that with my visor it does not work and I have no idea why, here is what I tried.
1.Item.Java 2.public static boolean playerHats(int itemId) { 3. , "Visor", 4.private static String[] fullmask = { 5. , "Visor" 6.Compile, log in and it does not work :(
Fixed!!!!
What I did was add stats to the visor and it should work.

item.title: See Through
item.dc:creator: @i_want_fire i want fire
item.description:
@i_want_fire wrote:

Ok well I recently added Ganodermic to my PI server and it works fine up until the point that when I wear the visor and poncho you can see through them so I looked up how to fix that and I fixed the poncho but when I try to fix the visor you can still see through the visor, can someone help me with this please?
To fix the poncho I went in to
1.Item.Java

3. , “Poncho”,
4.private static String[] fullbody = {
5. , “Poncho”
6.Compile, log in and boom it was fixed!!!

But now when I do that with my visor it does not work and I have no idea why, here is what I tried.

Fixed!!!

What I did was add stats to the visor and it should work.
